## Description {#details}

This file implements a CFG sorting pass.

This pass reorders the blocks in a function to put them into topological order, ignoring loop backedges, and without any loop or exception being interrupted by a block not dominated by the its header, with special care to keep the order as similar as possible to the original order.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the layout successor from the original block order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &#42;MF = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;updateTerminator(OriginalSuccessor);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EH pads are selected first regardless of the block comparison order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When only one of the BBs is an EH pad, we give a higher priority to it, to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prevent common mismatches between possibly throwing calls and ehpads they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unwind to, as in the example below:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb0:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @foo      // If this throws, unwind to bb2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @bar      // If this throws, unwind to bb3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb2 (ehpad):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   handler&#95;bb2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb3 (ehpad):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   handler&#95;bb3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// continuing code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Because this pass tries to preserve the original BB order, this order will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not change. But this will result in this try-catch structure in CFGStackify,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// resulting in a mismatch:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   try</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     call @foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     call @bar    // This should unwind to bb3, not bb2!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   catch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     handler&#95;bb2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// catch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   handler&#95;bb3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// continuing code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we give a higher priority to an EH pad whenever it is ready in this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// example, when both bb1 and bb2 are ready, we would pick up bb2 first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Sort blocks by their number.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/compareblocknumbers"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/compareblocknumbers">CompareBlockNumbers</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/compareblocknumbers/#a62bfd742fa406a0b007846b3dcaab94d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/compareblocknumbers/#a62bfd742fa406a0b007846b3dcaab94d">operator()</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#afc8e480dff5f2ab978558fc32ae8940f">WasmDisableEHPadSort</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>-&gt;isEHPad() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;isEHPad())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>-&gt;isEHPad() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;isEHPad())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Bookkeeping for a region to help ensure that we don&#39;t mix blocks not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// dominated by the its header among its blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/entry"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/entry/#a4167dec092b2252b9120d82ade98b7a0">Entry</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/entry/#a936904f3e0193dbcf41cc18b26630ecd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SortRegion &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/entry/#a936904f3e0193dbcf41cc18b26630ecd">TheRegion</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/entry/#afff31d79a6e5ef070ffc0a7bb7ce371c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/entry/#afff31d79a6e5ef070ffc0a7bb7ce371c">NumBlocksLeft</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// List of blocks not dominated by Loop&#39;s header that are deferred until</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// after all of Loop&#39;s blocks have been seen.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/entry/#aa579205323c766f238fb482355db54f2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/entry/#aa579205323c766f238fb482355db54f2">Deferred</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Sort the blocks, taking special care to make sure that regions are not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// interrupted by blocks not dominated by their header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TODO: There are many opportunities for improving the heuristics here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Explore them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185" lineLink="#ab52c873c8169af2a8b1256ace3fe7a7c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3e4870aac193f722693ae7e24aa5a2be">sortBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloopinfo">MachineLoopInfo</a> &amp;MLI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyexceptioninfo">WebAssemblyExceptionInfo</a> &amp;WEI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinedominatortree">MachineDominatorTree</a> &amp;MDT) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember original layout ordering, so we can update terminators after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reordering to point to the original layout successor.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prepare for a topological sort: Record the number of predecessors each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block has, ignoring loop backedges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;unsigned, 16&gt;</a> NumPredsLeft(MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#aa22424ba23740b6a748e8d0c239b7e4c">getNumBlockIDs</a>(), 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> : MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.pred&#95;size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloop">MachineLoop</a> &#42;L = MLI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (L-&gt;getHeader() == &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.predecessors())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">            --<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumPredsLeft&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.getNumber()&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Topological sort the CFG, with additional constraints:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - Between a region header and the last block in the region, there can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    no blocks not dominated by its header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - It&#39;s desirable to preserve the original block order when possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We use two ready lists; Preferred and Ready. Preferred has recently</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// processed successors, to help preserve block sequences from the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order. Ready has the remaining ready blocks. EH blocks are picked first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from both queues.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue">PriorityQueue&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, std::vector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">                CompareBlockNumbers&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Preferred;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/priorityqueue">PriorityQueue&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, std::vector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">                CompareBlockNumbersBackwards&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Ready;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;EHInfo = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#aba3a6e52588de22d265ca68259e0c771">getWasmEHFuncInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SortRegionInfo SRI(MLI, WEI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Entry, 4&gt;</a> Entries;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> = &amp;MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#ac8ca28de0f4dcee651340e7ef0c45233">front</a>();;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SortRegion &#42;R = SRI.getRegionFor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (R) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If MBB is a region header, add it to the active region list. We can&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// put any blocks that it doesn&#39;t dominate until we see the end of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (R-&gt;getHeader() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Entries.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/entry/#a4167dec092b2252b9120d82ade98b7a0">Entry</a>(R));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each active region the block is in, decrement the count. If MBB is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the last block in an active region, take it off the list and pick up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// any blocks deferred because the header didn&#39;t dominate them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/entry/#a4167dec092b2252b9120d82ade98b7a0">Entry</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> : Entries)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.TheRegion-&gt;contains(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &amp;&amp; --<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.NumBlocksLeft == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;DeferredBlock : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.Deferred)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Ready.push(DeferredBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Entries.empty() &amp;&amp; Entries.back().NumBlocksLeft == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Entries.pop&#95;back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The main topological sort logic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;Succ : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;successors()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore backedges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloop">MachineLoop</a> &#42;SuccL = MLI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(Succ))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SuccL-&gt;getHeader() == Succ &amp;&amp; SuccL-&gt;contains(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Decrement the predecessor count. If it&#39;s now zero, it&#39;s ready.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (--NumPredsLeft&#91;Succ-&gt;getNumber()&#93; == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When we are in a SortRegion, we allow sorting of not only BBs that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// belong to the current (innermost) region but also BBs that are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dominated by the current region header. But we should not do this for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exceptions because there can be cases in which, for example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EHPad A&#39;s unwind destination (where the exception lands when it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not caught by EHPad A) is EHPad B, so EHPad B does not belong to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exception dominated by EHPad A. But EHPad B is dominated by EHPad A,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so EHPad B can be sorted within EHPad A&#39;s exception. This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// incorrect because we may end up delegating/rethrowing to an inner</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scope in CFGStackify. So here we make sure those unwind destinations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are deferred until their unwind source&#39;s exception is sorted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EHInfo &amp;&amp; EHInfo-&gt;hasUnwindSrcs(Succ)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> UnwindSrcs =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">              EHInfo-&gt;getUnwindSrcs(Succ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsDeferred = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-webassemblycfgsort-cpp-/entry/#a4167dec092b2252b9120d82ade98b7a0">Entry</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> : Entries) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UnwindSrcs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.TheRegion-&gt;getHeader())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.Deferred.push&#95;back(Succ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">              IsDeferred = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsDeferred)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Preferred.push(Succ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine the block to follow MBB. First try to find a preferred block,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to preserve the original block order when possible.</span></CodeLine>
